folder.name: setup for  dedicated sql pool for test  bank data

content.query:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- F.  EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT (CSV) - run once
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'fmt_csv')
BEGIN
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT fmt_csv
    WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS (FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', STRING_DELIMITER = '"', FIRST_ROW = 2)
    );
    PRINT 'External file format fmt_csv created';
END
ELSE
    PRINT 'External file format fmt_csv already exists';
GO
